TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {43020=Update: This is the first time that Chihayafuru, Yuki Suetsugu's manga that won the Manga Taisho (Cartoon Grand Prize) in 2009, has ranked #1 on the weekly sales charts. Before this past week, the manga only reached as high as #5 when the eighth volume went on sale in March.}
textBeforeTable: Update: This is the first time that Chihayafuru, Yuki Suetsugu's manga that won the Manga Taisho (Cartoon Grand Prize) in 2009, has ranked #1 on the weekly sales charts. Before this past week, the manga only reached as high as #5 when the eighth volume went on sale in March.
